title: runtime: API
body:
Delete the Type types, ChanDir, Itable.
Delete Alloc, Free, Lookup, Semacquire, Semrelease.
Rename Cgocalls and Goroutines to NumCgoCalls and NumGoroutines to match NumCPU?
In doc for GOOS/GOARCH, s/Go tree/running program/
In doc for SetFinalizer, s/aborts the program/panics/?

rsc will take care of the deletions.
